bill_title: provide certain incentives for energy conservation by electric utilities through voltage regulation.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide certain incentives for energy conservation by electric utilities through voltage regulation. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 49-34A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: An electric utility may recover, in addition to any annual rate adjustment approved pursuant to § 49-34A-100, an additional one percent return on equity for the investment and installation of any voltage regulation technology that reduces energy consumption, that improves grid efficiency, that raises or lowers voltage dynamically, and that is ninety-nine percent or more efficient across at least ninety percent of the load curve. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
